subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Before Derek Fisher’s two key 3-pointers Thursday night in Game 4 of the N.B.A. finals, his game had appeared to catch up to the leisurely pace of his shot.
snippet: Before Derek Fisher’s two key 3-pointers Thursday night in Game 4 of the N.B.A. finals, his game had appeared to catch up to the leisurely pace of his shot.
